text: [Music]
my name is juan i'm a senior cloud
support manager when i started nine
years ago i started as a cloud support
associate that's the first time we hired
this role actually at that time cloud
was something new i look at different
jobs on the market and i saw there's a
very interesting one cloud support
associate and that drove me to go more
into the cloud because i knew cloud
would be a big thing for this industry
it was going to change the world and i
was right we already changed the world
when we hire people we are not looking
for cloud background
we hire people who wants to learn and
who have a passion about the technology
after nine years this is a very mature
program we have very very well organized
training and very well organized the
process to enable people to be
successful i would say for people here
you own your career journey just think
about you are the ceo of the work you
own no matter where you want to go you
own that journey and your manager and
the team will be here to support you to
get there eventually but you have the
choice here you can go anywhere
[Music]
